message_1: If the Caesar cipher encryption moves each letter in the alphabet by three positions, what is the decrypted version of the message "KHOOR ZRUOG" using the same cipher technique?
message_2:
To decrypt the message "KHOOR ZRUOG" using the Caesar cipher technique, we need to move each letter back by three positions in the alphabet.

K -> J -> I -> H
H -> G -> F -> E
O -> N -> M -> L
O -> N -> M -> L
R -> Q -> P -> O
(space remains the same)
Z -> Y -> X -> W
R -> Q -> P -> O
U -> T -> S -> R
O -> N -> M -> L
G -> F -> E -> D

The decrypted message is "HELLO WORLD".
